text: if you don't have a US visa can you
still do YC the short answer to this
question is yes you can we have lots of
founders that are not US citizens and
don't have a US visa when they apply to
YC do YC it's almost never a problem the
most common option for founders in this
situation is called a b-1 visa if you
want to google that it's like B - one
space visa which is a temporary business
visa they're quite easy to get and we
have a lot of experience helping
founders to get them it's very rarely an
issue to get a b-1 visa for the three to
four months that you'll spend in YC so
if you're not American and you're still
interested in doing YC don't worry the
visa is not going to be the problem
